name: joe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
coffee: You'll just get a regular cup of joe at this diner, nothing fancy with frothy milk. I can't function until I've had my morning cup of joe.
More examplesFewer examplesHe made a pot of freshly brewed joe and settled down to work for the day.The company sells 20 million cups of joe a year.It's becoming harder and harder to just order a simple cup of joe these days as there are so many options.
